DOC.brief_summary: This two-center, between-subject, randomized, double-masked study (n=20) will provide the first evidence for the antidepressant efficacy of Magnetic Seizure Therapy (MST) and contrast the therapeutic properties and side effects of two forms of MST in patients in a major depressive episode (MDE).
DOC.brief_title: Magnetic Seizure Therapy (MST) for the Treatment of Major Depression
